sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Movie, MoviesService } from '../movies.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-movielist', templateUrl: './movielist.component.html', styleUrls: ['./movielist.component.css'] }) export class MovielistComponent { movies!:Movie[]; ngOnInit():void{ this.movieService.movies$.subscribe((movies:Movie[]) => { this.movies = movies; console.log(this.movies) }) this.movieService.discoverMovies({page:3}).subscribe(); } constructor(private movieService:MoviesService) { } }
